text: Jesse Williams ’ estranged wife, Aryn Drake - Lee, is requesting sole legal custody of the couple ’ s two kids, Sadie and Maceo, citing the actor ’ s unpredictable work schedule, a dangerous driving incident and his alleged “ revolving door ” of women. In court documents filed on Friday, August 11, and obtained by Us Weekly, the real estate broker claims that she is responsible for the day - to - day care of the kids because of the Grey ’ s Anatomy star ’ s busy schedule. “ Jesse would ‘ join in ’ when he was available and home, but he rarely took care of the children without my or [ the nanny ] Martiza ’ s help and presence, ” the documents say. “ Jesse became distant, secretive and was home less and less, traveling for unexplained reasons
